author: Phil
content:

author: Phil
content:
thought about it at 5am and
said screw-it.

author: Alexandra
content: I’m in NC and I Gotta chance to see it when I got off work at 6:30 am.

author: D. Peter Boucher, Kt. SMOM, International Master Mariner
content: Just went outside to see a beautiful moon tonight in the “Banana Republic of Miami-Dade County” aka Dade County, Florida, USA, one day before the official “superblueblood” moon. The eclipse will be seen in Alaska, California and Hawaii all parts of the USA.

author: Phil
content:

author: Phil
content: There is also an Eclipse, but I doubt we’ll see it in the USA.
